objective: Identify remote EU consulting and contract engagements aligned with the captain's AI/CTO skillset.

metadata.notes: Groq performs high-speed scan; Claude twin validates and prioritises.

workflow: Scan EU-focused remote job boards (RemoteEU, WeWorkRemotely, EuropeRemotely) for AI/ML, CTO, data engineering roles.
Query freelance marketplaces (Upwork, Toptal, Gun.io, Malt) for short to mid-term AI strategy or automation projects.
Review EU startup job boards for fractional CTO, technical advisor, or AI consultant postings.
Filter opportunities: remote-friendly, English-acceptable, €3k-€10k monthly equivalent, fits AI/automation capabilities.
Summarise at least 10 qualified opportunities with contact channels, compensation estimates, duration, and skill match score.
